opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Weaver v. Kyler, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Huntingdon

opinion:
538 U.S. 942

WEAVER
v.
KYLER, SUPERINTENDENT, STATE CORRECTIONAL INSTITUTION AT HUNTINGDON, ET AL.

No. 02-8754.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 31, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE THIRD CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 3d Cir. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and certiorari dismissed. See this Court's Rule 39.8. Reported below: 36 Fed. Appx. 693.
